Sarkas¶

A Pure Python Molecular Dynamics package for Non-Ideal Plasmas¶

Sarkas is a pure-python molecular dynamics (MD) package designed with plasma physics in mind. The pure-python construction allows users to quickly add their own features to model the systems of their choosing.
